descriptionHtml:
[font=Courier New][size=6] DAEDRIC ARMOR WINTER RETEXTURE[/size][size=3]
[/size]
[/font][size=5]This mod has been improved and fixed by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1029075]wtfthis[/url]. His changes can be found here:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64246/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64246/?
[/url][/size]
[font=Verdana][size=3]
HISTORY[/size][/font]

[font=Tahoma][size=2]V2.0[/size][/font][size=5]
[/size]
[list]
[*]Fixed a major bug that caused the armor to appear HORRIBLE for certain weights. (Xanins, Thank You)
[/list]
[font=Tahoma][size=2]V1.2[/size][/font]

[list]
[*]Added two glows, Blue and Frost as well as Optional standalone versions that can be used with other Daedric Armor textures.
[*]Changed the Armor's hue a bit.
[/list]
[font=Tahoma][size=2]V1.11[/size][/font]

[list]
[*]Fixed horrible looking spot underneath the Helmet.
[/list]
[font=Tahoma][size=2]V1.1[/size][/font]

[list]
[*]Smaller file size
[/list]
[font=Tahoma][size=2]V1.0[/size][/font]

[list]
[*]Accidentally left unnecessary files in the mod, my bad!
[/list][list=1]

[/list][font=Tahoma][size=3]CREDITS[/size][/font]

Inspired by DubstepKid's "Daedric Winter Set"

This mod is using modified textures from GarryG's "Daedric Armor and weapon Improvement",
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3104]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3104

[/url]
author: ScarletR8
